summary: Professional website for Jonathan Ayan, a life and annuity insurance broker in Miami, Florida. Homepage showcasing broker information, services offered, and A-rated insurance companies represented (Mutual of Omaha, FNG, Transamerica, Ethos, Forrester, and others).
architectural_notes: Professional presentation for insurance broker services
Display broker credentials and company affiliations
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Professional hero background image showing Miami skyline or financial security theme (hero-background.dim_1920x600.png)
- Simple icon representing life insurance protection (life-insurance-icon.dim_64x64.png)
- Simple icon representing annuities and retirement planning (annuities-icon.dim_64x64.png)

existing_features.title: Create a professional homepage that introduces Jonathan Ayan as a life and annuity insurance broker based in Miami, Florida
Display a section showcasing the A-rated insurance companies Jonathan represents, including Mutual of Omaha, FNG, Transamerica, Ethos, and Forrester
Create a services section explaining life insurance and annuities offerings with clear descriptions of what assistance is available
Include contact information section for potential clients to reach Jonathan Ayan

Design the homepage with a professional, trustworthy visual theme using warm, sophisticated colors (such as navy blue, gold accents, and crisp whites), clean typography, and a layout that conveys stability and expertise appropriate for financial services

new_feature_requests.summary: Create homepage with broker information and services
Show contact information and Miami, Florida location
